high_descs: Turn to the right and cross over to the counter
Pick up the sponge sitting on the left
Turn to the right and head towards the toilet and then turn left crossing over to the silver shelves
Place the sponge on the second shelf
Turn around and go towards the toilet turning left again and crossing the room to the bath tub
Pick up the sponge sitting in the bath tub
Turn right and cross the bathroom turning left to go to the silver shelves against the wall.
Place sponge on shelf beside the other sponge.
tasks.task_desc: Move both sponges to the second shelf

high_descs: Turn right and head to the black vanity table.
Pick up the pink bar of soap to the left of the green sponge on the vanity top.
Turn around, cross the room, hang a left at the shower to reach the wall and turn right to face the gray sink.
Put the soap inside the sink, fill with water to rinse it, and pick up the clean bar of soap.
Turn right, hang a left at the bathtub, walk to the white door and head left to the silver wire rack near the window.
Place the bar of soap on the lowest steel shelf in the middle behind the two yellow spray bottles.
tasks.task_desc: Place a clean bar of soap on a steel shelf.

high_descs: Turn right, walk to the counter,.
Pick up the soap on the counter.
Turn around, walk straight to the toilet, turn left to face the tub, walk straight to the tub and turn right to face the bathroom sink.
Place the soap in the sink, run water, turn off the faucet, then pick up the soap in the sink.
Turn right, walk straight, turn left to face the bathroom door, walk straight, turn left when you reach the door to face the rack.
Place the clean soap on the rack.
tasks.task_desc: Place clean soap on a rack.

high_descs: Turn to your right and walk to the vanity across the room
Pick up the soap that is sitting on the vanity
Turn around and take a few steps, then turn left and walk to the sink across the room
Place the soap in the sink then turn on the sink. Turn off the sink and pick up the soap.
Walk past the sink to the metal shelf that is on your left
Place the soap on the middle shelf
tasks.task_desc: Place wet soap on a shelf

high_descs: turn right and go to the counter with the kleenex sitting on top
pick up the pink soap
turn around face the toilet then go to your left towards the grey sink
turn the water on place the soap in the sink rinse it off
take the soap the the wire shelving to the right of the sink
place the soap on the middle shelf
tasks.task_desc: take rinsed off sink to a shelf and put it there

high_descs: Turn to the right and go straight back to the desk.
Pick up the bar of soap on the desk, beside the sponge.
Take the bar of soap and turn around. Take a few steps and turn right to find the grey sink.
Place the soap in the sink and turn the water on. Turn the water off and pick up the soap.
Carry the soap and go to the left around the sink, to the metal tower.
Place the soap on the middle shelf of the tower.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse off a bar of soap and place it on a shelf.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the pink soap on the counter.
Pick up the pink soap on the counter.
Turn around and walk to the gray sink.
Rinse the soap in the pink and then pick the soap up from the sink.
Walk to the metal shelf to the left of the blue trash can.
Place the soap behind the yellow spray bottles on the shelf.
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed bar of pink soap behind the yellow spray bottles on the shelf.

high_descs: Turn around, walk straight to the wall, then turn left to face rack.
Look down the rack to grab the soap on top of the rack.
Turn left to walk straight, walk straight, make a quick left, then turn right, walk straight to the tub, turn right when you reach the tub, turn around to face the sink.
Place the soap in the sink, run the water, turn the water off, and grab the soap from the sink.
Turn right, walk straight, turn left to face the bathroom door, walk straight, turn left when you reach the door to face the rack.
Place the clean soap on the rack.
tasks.task_desc: Place the clean soap on the rack.

high_descs: turn right and walk until the bathroom towel rack is on your left, then turn towards the towel rack and walks to it
grab a bar of soap out of the top rack of the towel holder rack
turn left and walk over to the bathtub at the end of the room, then turn right and walk to the wall, then one more right turn to face the left side of the sink
rinse off the soap in the sink
turn right and walk forwards a bit to be center with the tub, then take a left and walk to the end of the room, then another left to stand in front of the towel rack
place the soap back on the top shelf of the towel rack
tasks.task_desc: place a clean bar of soap on the towel rack

high_descs: Head towards the metal rack in front of you.
Pick up the top bar soap on the rack.
Turn left and head towards the sink.
Place the soap in the sink, wash it, and pick it back up.
Take a step to the right towards the metal rack.
Place the bar soap on the second to top shelf on the rack.

high_descs: Turn right, then turn left and head to the rack
Pick up the soap on the first level of the rack
Turn to your left and head to the sink
Put the soap on the sink then rinse it and pick it up
Turn to your right and go back to the rack
Put the soap on the second level of the rack

high_descs: Move to the silver rack to the right of the sink.
Pick up the soap from the rack.
Move to the left side of the sink to the left of you.
Place the soap in the sink and run some water before turning off the water and picking up the soap.
Move to the silver rack to the right of the sink.
Place the soap on the silver rack.

grab the pink bar on the shelf
walk to the left a little
put the pink bar in the sink, wash it with water, take it out

Put the soap on the middle shelf.

Pick up the soap from the rack.

Take the soap back to the rack.
Put the soap back on the rack.

high_descs: Turn to the right and head towards the shower then turn right and go to the counter
Pick up the middle sponge from the counter
Turn around and go halfway to the toilet then turn left and go past the bathtub then turn right and go to the sink

Put the sponge in the bottom drawer of the counter

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the counter.
Pick up the green sponge that is in the middle.
Turn around and take two steps, then turn left and walk across the room, then turn right.
Put the sponge in the sink and turn on the faucet for three seconds, then turn the faucet off and pick up the sponge.
Turn to the right and walk across the room, then turn to the right and walk across the room.
Open the bottom drawer of the table and put the sponge inside.
tasks.task_desc: To wash the sponge.

high_descs: Walk to the kitchen counter behind you.
Grab the middle sponge from the counter.
Walk to the kitchen sink on your left.
Put the sponge in the sink, wash it, then take it out of the sink.
Walk to the kitchen counter again on your left.
Put the sponge in the bottom drawer.

high_descs: Turn left and take four steps, turn right for one step, then turn left to face the tub.
Pick up the scrub sponge that is to the left of the two sponges nearest the drain.
Turn right for one step; turn right again to face the sink.
Put the sponge in the sink, standing vertically with the green side to the right, turn the water on for a few seconds and turn off, then pick up the sponge when the water has drained.
Turn right and take nine steps, take another right and walk to the black and white desk.
Open the bottom drawer on the left, place the sponge lying down on the far left with the green side up. Close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned scrub sponge in the bottom drawer of a desk.

high_descs: Turn left and walk up to the bathtub
Pick up the far left green sponge from the bathtub
Turn around and go up to the side of the sink
Wash the sponge under water in the sink and remove it
Turn right and go forward, then turn right again and approach the vanity
Open the bottom vanity drawer and put the sponge in it
tasks.task_desc: Put the cleaned sponge in the bottom drawer

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the tub.
Pick up the sponge in the back.
Turn around and face the sink.
Put the sponge in the sink, turn on the water, turn off the water, and pick up the sponge.
Turn right and walk to the shower, turn right, and walk to the counter.
Open the bottom drawer, put the sponge in the bottom drawer, and close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean sponge in the bottom drawer.

high_descs: Turn to your left and go to the bathtub, in the back corner of the bathroom.

Place the sponge in the sink, turn the water on, rinse out the sponge, turn the water off, and remove the sponge from the sink.

Place the sponge in the bottom, left drawer, underneath the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean sponge in the bathroom drawer.
